name: Dr. Madd
tips: The more time spent on concocting the potion, the higher its damage and controlling effects will be.

ski.name: ACIDIC BOG
desc: Unleash an Acidic Bog on the target area for 6 seconds to deal continuous damage to enemy units within and reduce their Armor.
data: Acidic Bog's Magic Damage: 80/95/110/125 per Second
study: Deals continuous damage and causes debuffs
update: Magic Damage and Debuff Effect increased, Cooldown reduced.

ski.name: EXPLOSIVE AGENT
desc: Activate and brew Explosive Agent in 4 or fewer seconds, then you have another 2 seconds to throw and deal magic damage plus stun to target. Otherwise, it stuns you instead.
study: =Deals physical damage and stuns the enemy.

ski.name: GENETIC MANIPULATION
desc: Inject bestial genes into self to gain the beast form and significantly increase Max Health, Movement Speed, Attack Speed, Health and Mana Recovery for 20 seconds.

ski.name: CORROSIVE ATTACK
desc: Dr. Maddâ€™s attacks corrode an opponentâ€™s weapon, lowering their ATK and Attack Speed for 3 seconds. Can stack up to 3 times. If the opponent is a hero, the lowered part of ATK and Attack Speed will be stolen by Dr. Madd.

story: Dr. Stein, who had been missing for years, was captured by the coalition. The doctor fled after releasing the G17 and R42 viruses, and coalition forces lost two divisions killing the doctor's wife. No-one knows the whereabouts of Dr. Stein and his biological weapon, which hangs over the heads of the coalition like a sword of Damocles.
